name: arborization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a structure shaped like a tree, found at the end of a nerve, or the existence of such structures: The total length of each arborization was calculated. The animals showed increases in dendritic arborisation and spine density. Related word
arborize
More examplesFewer examplesNotice the dendritic arborizations in the ganglion cells.Following the operation, the patient was left with severe arborisation abnormalities.We labelled three neurons with a different pattern of arborisation.The study looks at abnormalities of cell arborization in mice.These dendrites do not fill the region of arborization and branch only infrequently.
